name: Don't stare too long
description:
(CRASHED, we are trying to fix it  :'c )

Ps1 stylish horror game. (UNFINISHED)

Dont stare too long its a game develop for weekly game jam 148 under the theme "Mirror"

The game is about you in the forest old cabin, what can't you stare for so long? what does the mirror trully means?

Controls: 

WASD to move.

Click to Equip the mirror (when you find it).

CTRL to crouch.

Shift to sprint.

(All the people in this project are trying new artistic/programming skills on unity/blender)

Felipe: Programming

Joaquin: Programming

Manuel: Artist (character and monster)

Lucas: Artist (envrioment)
